1370: Amilius was born in St. Aechten straet in 1370.
Got married to Saxiardis at age 27 in 1370.
1371: Had a son with Saxiardis, Everyng, at age 28.
1372: Had a son with Saxiardis, Coppesoeten, at age 29.
1373: Had a son with Saxiardis, Herlewin, at age 30.
1375: Had a daughter with Saxiardis, Wijfgode, at age 32.
1376: Had a son with Saxiardis, Andreas, at age 33.
1377: Had a daughter with Saxiardis, Marcibilia, at age 34.
1378: Had a daughter with Saxiardis, Wendelmodis, at age 35.
1380: Had a daughter with Saxiardis, Ermerut, at age 37.
1381: Had a daughter with Saxiardis, Lielde, at age 38.
Lost son Everyng when Everyng was 11 years old.
